tool_description: Convert a video frame into JPEG or PNG image at desired timestamp
name: Video Image Generator
title: Video Image Generator

api_list.name: capture
api_list.description: Captures a video frame at a given timestamp
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://video-image-generator.p.rapidapi.com/Seek"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "video-image-generator.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://video-image-generator.p.rapidapi.com/Seek"

headers = {

print(response.json())
